message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $170. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $120. Could we possibly meet in the middle?
Hi Bob, I understand your position, but $120 is too low for me. Could you consider $145?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. I would like to counter with $130. This feels like a fair compromise.
